name: Window.StaticRange
description: The DOMÂ StaticRange interface extends AbstractRange to provide a method to specify a range of content in the DOM whose contents don't update to reflect changes which occur within the DOM tree.
content:
The DOMStaticRange interface extends AbstractRange to provide a method to specify a range of content in the DOM whose contents don't update to reflect changes which occur within the DOM tree. It offers the same set of properties and methods asAbstractRange.

AbstractRange andStaticRange are not available from web workers.
